text: Gewerkschaft Deutscher Lokomotivführer (GDL) () is a trade union of Germany. Its president is Claus Weselsky , who took over from Manfred Schell in 2008. The GDL has a membership of 34,000. Most members live in the old East Germany. GDL is a member of the Deutscher Beamtenbund (dbb). == Other websites == *GDL homepage Category:Trade unions in Germany
title: Gewerkschaft Deutscher Lokomotivführer
